person.persName: John P. Harrison (Covington house painter and Justice of the Peace)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, painter. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Harrison. Father of George Harrison and Sarah Harrison. Enslaved one person in 1860. Covington Justice of the Peace in 1860.
